short_summary: GARMENT RENTAL, LAUNDRY SERVICE AND DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDERS
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has a requirement for garment rental, laundry and delivery services for a variety of protective garments used in laboratories, workshops, and meat processing and slaughter establishments.
full_summary:
===============

**Western Area Laundry Services**

**Information Branch**
**Prairies and Northern Region**
**Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada**

**Notice No. 2023-00009/A**

**Date:** August 9, 2023

**Closing Date:** August 25, 2023 at 14:00 hours

**Summary**

The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites you to participate in the Request for Proposal (RFP) process for garment rental, laundry, and delivery services for the Western Area. The proposed contract is expected to commence on October 1, 2023 and end on September 30, 2025, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods under the same conditions.

**Services Required**

This RFP seeks a service provider to deliver various protective garments used in laboratories, workshops, meat processing, and slaughter houses. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing:

- Garment rental services
- Laundry services
- Delivery services

**Pre-Qualification Requirements**

This procurement has been conditionally set aside under the Federal Government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be eligible, the bidder must provide proof of Indigenous status and comply with PSIB requirements.

**Security Requirements**

Security requirements do not apply.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada–Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
- Canada United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Associated Documents**

The RFP document, along with annexes, is available for download at [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7859/2023-00009---rfp---english.pdf).
